column4: Is it fixed in hoary tritium, cause if it was he could try updating to fix it.....
I don't think so.  That bug says "Hoary will hang..."
actually, it says the status is resolved, so it might be fixed
I noticed that graveman uses cdrecord.  Maybe the problem is that cdrecord can't find your burner?
actually I can be faily shure that it does detect my cdroms because It is telling me the correct names of them and letting me chose which ones to use
AHH-HA!  it did need to be started as sudo to work!
strange.  I didn't need that.  Is your user not in the "cdrom" group?
my user is the default user, if Im not in the cdrom group its a bug
not to a binary package.  You'd have to fetch the source package, and apply the patch to source, then rebuild it.
could you link me to a how-to on how to do that?
nothing specific.  If you know that patch you want to apply, give it a try.
well I don't even know how to apply a patch so... could you help me out there?
its alright, im just going to make a thread. thanks for helping this much
